text.en:
Before you can continue to the application form, we need to verify if you are required to pay the application fee of 100 €.

Applicants to Finnish higher education institutions who are applying based on a qualification completed outside the EU/EEA –area or Switzerland are required to pay an application fee of 100 €. This concerns applicants to both Bachelor's and Master's level studies. The application fee covers all the applications to Finnish higher education institutions that an applicant makes for study programmes that start in the same semester.

The collection of application fees is based on the Universities Act and the Polytechnics Act. The fee is charged due to the administrative expenses caused by the verification work on qualifications completed outside EU/EEA countries or Switzerland and to develop the electronic application system.

If you are required to pay the application fee, it needs to be paid before filling in the application.

The application fee is collected by the Finnish National Board of Education.

To get started, please sign in with your Google account or order a login link to your e-mail.

link.en: Order login link to your email.

text.en: You have not selected any programme and therefore you can only see existing applications. In case you want to apply to a new programme, please select programme from www.studyinfo.fi.

unexpected.en: Unexpected server error. Please try again later.

userdata.en: Invalid userdata. Please check form values and try again.

pageload.en: Unfortunately something went wrong. Please reload page and try again.

hakukohde.en: This programme does not use application fees.

hakuaika.en: This programme is not open for applying at the moment.

link.en: Login link sent to your email.

country.en: Country of the institution which has awarded the degree

required.en: You are required to pay the application fee of 100€.

notRequired.en: Your degree is from an EU/EEA country and you are not required to pay the application fee.

alreadyPaid.en: You have already paid application fee of 100€.

info.en: Please enter the following information exactly as in your passport (with capital initials, no capslock).

personalId.en: I have Finnish personal identification code

invalidBirthDate.en: Insert date of birth in correct format.

requiredPersonId.en: Insert Personal identification code in correct format (last 5 characters).

info.en: Please enter your education information for applying to

payment.en: This information is used only to define if you need to pay the application fee. On the application form you can give additional information about your educational background.

requiredEducationLevel.en: Level of the degree is required.

requiredEducationCountry.en: Country of the institution is required.

info.en:
You are required to pay application fee of 100€ before continuing to the application. The application fee is collected by the Finnish National Board of Education (Opetushallitus).

Payment methods

Credit card (Visa, Visa Debit, Visa Electron, Mastercard, Mastercard Debit)

Finnish internet banking codes

ok.en: Thank you, your payment has been received.

info.en: Continue to applications with following links.
